DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study aimed to validate a new prognostic approach of endothelial progenitor cells associated biomarkers in patients with acute coronary syndromes . Recruitment is made prospectively by two centers of Inter -region South Mediterranean,
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Biomarkers Associated With Endothelial Progenitor Cells Mobilization in Acute Coronary Syndromes
DOC.criteria: acute coronary syndrome (ST + < 12 hours and ST high risk or intermediate risk ),which there is an indication of percutaneous coronary intervention. Cancer Chronic inflammatory disease Infectious disease Erythrocyte <4 G/l Thrombop√©nia less than 100 000/mm3 ;
